title: A physiologically relevant in vitro model gut system
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The project is ongoing until 29 Mar 2015. The findings so far have been used to build a case of support for the patent filed by Newcastle University (GB1320781.6) from technology developed in BB/G00563X/1. Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Economic
findingsText: Project is ongoing until 29 March 2015 The data so far is helping develop a business model for a spin out company using this technology developed in BB/G00563X/1. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
